name: Grampy's Bowel Movement Simulator
description:
Note: As of now, this game can only be played on Windows!

Help Grampy with his constipation relief by completing a simple tilt maze game! This prototype was quickly put together for a weekly game dev class assignment (Prompt #2: Three Constraints). This is the first game I built on UE4.

Created by Tengku Hana Shafikah. Made in Unreal Engine.
